scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-hardhat && npm run clean-wordpress && npm run clean-thegraph && npm run clean-gulp && npm run clean-svelte && npm run clean-common
scripts.install-wordpress: cd wordpress && pnpm install && npm run instal
scripts.install-all: npm run install-hardhat && npm run install-wordpress && npm run install-thegraph && npm run install-gulp && npm run install-svelte && npm run install-common
scripts.build-all: npm run build-hardhat && npm run build-wordpress && npm run build-thegraph && npm run build-gulp && npm run build-svelte && npm run build-common
scripts.check-all: npm run check-hardhat && npm run check-wordpress && npm run check-thegraph && npm run check-gulp && npm run check-svelte && npm run check-common
scripts.tests-all: npm run tests-hardhat && npm run tests-wordpress && npm run tests-thegraph && npm run tests-gulp && npm run tests-svelte && npm run tests-common
scripts.all: npm run clean-all && npm run install-all && npm run build-all && npm run check-all && npm run tests-all
scripts.build-dapp: rm -rf dapp/build && npm run clean-gulp && npm run install-gulp && npm run build-gulp && npm run clean-svelte && npm run install-svelte && npm run build-svelte && npm run check-svelte
scripts.build-plugin: npm run clean-wordpress && npm run install-wordpress && npm run build-wordpress && npm run check-wordpress
